question: You wake up in a quiet forest clearing. A glowing map appears in front of you. What do you do?

options.text: Follow the path immediately.
Study the map carefully.
Sit and enjoy the morning light first.
Look around to see if anyone else is nearby.

question: You come across a fork in the road. One path is misty and mysterious. The other is wide and sunny. A third leads into a dark cave. A fourth has music echoing from it.

options.text: Take the misty path — curiosity calls.
Choose the dark cave — thrill is life.
Pick the sunny road — calm is peace.
Head toward the music — there might be friends!

question: A stranger offers you an artifact. “It reflects who you are,” they say. You can only choose one.

options.text: A glowing compass.
A pair of bouncing boots.
A pocket-sized zen garden.
A magical speaker that plays party music.

question: Night falls. You need to rest. There’s a treehouse, a hammock by the river, a glowing cave, and a communal campsite.

options.text: Treehouse — solid and above ground.
Cave — mysterious and sheltered.
Hammock — peaceful and isolated.
Campsite — cozy and full of chatter.

question: You meet three other jellies arguing about which route to take. They ask for your opinion.

options.text: Suggest splitting up and gathering data.
Lead the way without hesitation.
Offer to stay behind and wait things out.
Ask everyone to share their thoughts in a circle.

question: A challenge appears: cross a river. There’s a fallen log, a zipline, a ferry, or you can wait for someone else.

options.text: Zipline across!
Use the ferry — stable and safe.
Wait for someone — no rush.
Shout to attract help — maybe someone will join.

question: You enter a glowing glade where a spirit asks: “What’s most important to you?”

options.text: Understanding the truth of the world.
Living life to the fullest.
Finding peace and quiet.
Being with others and sharing joy.

question: A creature is blocking your path. It doesn’t look aggressive, but it won’t let you pass.

options.text: Try to understand what it wants.
Challenge it to a jelly duel.
Wait and observe from afar.
Talk to it and try to befriend it.

question: A magical mirror shows your true self. But only briefly — what do you catch a glimpse of?

options.text: A glowing constellation.
A wildfire racing through a canyon.
A candle glowing in the dark.
A disco ball spinning among friends.

question: At the end of your journey, a final choice appears: a door to your new jelly life. Which door do you open?

options.text: A quiet library beneath the stars.
A volcano-top hangout.
A cozy cave with a cup of tea.
A rooftop garden party.
